text: Rosita Fornés (February 11, 1923 - June 10, 2020) was a Cuban-American singer and actress. She was born in New York City. She was known for her roles in A Dangerous Adventure (1939), Musical Romance (1941), The Flesh Commands (1948), The Desire (1948), Women of the Theatre (1951) and in The Unknown Mariachi (1953). Fornés died of emphysema on June 10, 2020 at a hospital in Miami, Florida at the age of 97.Fallece Rosita Fornés, la vedette de Cuba, a los 97 años ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1923 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from emphysema Category:Cancer deaths in Florida Category:Cuban actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:Singers from New York City
title: Rosita Fornés
